inputSystem¶

class inputSystem.InputSystem(event_manager, world)[source]¶

Gets events from controllers and translates this to actions

Attributes:
  • world (gameWorld.GameWorld): game world
  • event_manager (events.EventManager): event manager
handle_hat_moved(x, y)[source]¶

Hat controlls player movement.

Parameters:
  • x (int) – x position
  • y (int) – y position
handle_joystick(x_axis, y_axis)[source]¶

Joystick controls aim and attack direction.

Parameters:
  • x_axis (float) – x position of the axis
  • y_axis (float) – y position of the axis
handle_key_pressed(key)[source]¶

Keys A, D and W controll players movement.

Parameters:key (pygame constant) – key pressed
handle_key_released(key)[source]¶

Player stops movement, when key is released.

Parameters:key (pygame constant) – key pressed
handle_mouse_move(mouse_x, mouse_y)[source]¶

Position of the mouse cursor controlls aim and attack direction.

Parameters:
  • mouse_x (int) – x mouse position in pixel in screen coordinates
  • mouse_y – y mouse position in pixel in screen coordinates
move_orb(x, y)[source]¶

Moves and rotates the orb according players aim input.

No rotation is when aim direction is right from the player.

Parameters:
  • x (int) – x position in octant
  • y (int) – y position in octant

Notify, when event occurs.

Parameters:event (events.Event) – occured event
